title: SpawnSessionRequest
description: Payload for spawning a new session with server-generated manifests. Higher-level API than CreateSessionRequest

projectId.description: ID of the project for the spawned session (required)

taskIds.description: Array of task IDs the spawned session will work on (required)

role.description: Optional role for the spawned session, determines which skills are loaded

spawnSource.description: Optional source indicating what triggered this spawn - 'ui' for user-initiated, 'session' for agent-spawned

sessionId.description: Required when spawnSource is 'session' - ID of the parent session that spawned this one

sessionName.description: Optional custom name for the spawned session

skills.description: Optional array of skill names to load for this session

spawnedBy.description: DEPRECATED - use 'sessionId' instead. Optional ID of the session that spawned this one

context.description: Optional arbitrary context data to pass to the spawned session
